results.title: The Secret sharer
results.creator_credit: Joseph Conrad, Larry Yust and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: A screen adaptation of a Joseph Conrad short story. This film concerns a young, inexperienced sea captain’s encounter with a fugitive from naval justice. Follows the captain endangering his ship through helping the fugitive, and shows how he regains control.

results.title: Teaching machines and programmed learning
results.creator_credit: James Learmonth, Digby Duncan and Gateway Educational Films
results.brief_description: This film explains the use of teaching machines in the classroom. It demonstrates simple and complex machines and defines programmed learning into two types - linear and branching.
results.creator_credit_for_label: James Learmonth, Digby Duncan and Gateway Educational Films

results.title: Hockey. Film 3. Advanced skills
results.creator_credit: Sally Methven and University of Queensland
results.brief_description: Covers advanced skills: the flick, the penalty stroke, the art of goalkeeping and reverse stick hitting. All skills are described clearly in diagrams and in a game.
results.description: Covers advanced skills: the flick, the penalty stroke, the art of goalkeeping and reverse stick hitting. All skills are described clearly in diagrams and in a game.

results.title: Hockey. Film 2. Basic skills
results.creator_credit: Sally Methven and University of Queensland
results.brief_description: Covers the skill of pushing and the tactics involved in the push in - demonstrating where players stand, both in offence and defence, dodging and tackling are the other two important skills covered very thoroughly.
results.description: Covers the skill of pushing and the tactics involved in the push in - demonstrating where players stand, both in offence and defence, dodging and tackling are the other two important skills covered very thoroughly.

results.title: Hockey. Film 1. Basic skills
results.creator_credit: Sally Methven and University of Queensland
results.brief_description: Covers some of the basic skills used in hockey: hitting, stopping, pushing and dribbling. It also provides instruction on the bully or start of a game and positions of players on the field. A discussion of both forward and defence players, including the goalkeeper.
results.description: Covers some of the basic skills used in hockey: hitting, stopping, pushing and dribbling. It also provides instruction on the bully or start of a game and positions of players on the field. A discussion of both forward and defence players, including the goalkeeper.

results.title: Computers and you
results.creator_credit: Reinald Werrenrath Jr and Journal Films
results.brief_description: In this film a computer display terminal and diagrams are used to explain, in simple terms, how a computer works and what it can do. A clear, visual explanation of how “bits” of information are given and instructions, flow charts, and information storage methods are explained. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level students.

results.title: The Last marsh
results.brief_description: A photographic record of one of the last great urban marshes, the Powderhorn Marsh, filled in 1968 to constitute an urban intersection in Chicago. The destruction of the marsh raises many ecological questions. Must encroaching urbanisation continue to disrupt natural wildlife preserves?
results.description: A photographic record of one of the last great urban marshes, the Powderhorn Marsh, filled in 1968 to constitute an urban intersection in Chicago. The destruction of the marsh raises many ecological questions. Must encroaching urbanisation continue to disrupt natural wildlife preserves?

results.title: A Selection interview. - 2nd ed.
results.creator_credit: Cecil Holmes, Joe Scully and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description:
In this film we follow one nervous applicant and the members of a selection panel to the interview room. The selection interview covers the educational background of the applicant, job expectation, the candidate’s handling of certain situations and their interests, abilities and perception of their present job. Cast includes Peter Whittle, Tony Leadley, John Warwick, Marcia Waite, Richard Meckle.
Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: The Frog prince
results.brief_description: This is one of the beautifully made Lotte reiniger silhouette puppet films of the traditional fairy story. To decide which of his daughters should marry next, the king tosses each of them a golden ball, which the youngest one catches. She accidentally drops it down a well and it is recovered by a frog who is later transformed into a handsome man.

results.title: Five problems in communication
results.brief_description: An animated film that deals with five serious communication problems. These are: 1. Too much noise to be heard properly. 2. Not coming directly to the point. 3. Not speaking clearly. 4. Not listening when you should. 5. Not paying attention to signs.
